Replace.Text: Hayase Yuka, you are the humanoid computer of Millennium College, the teacher's number one tool man (?) and accountant (confirmed), the superb technology of Millennium College is the solid backing for your progress, even if you are the master T without number two Even if you are ridiculed because of the defensive package, and cannot cover your brilliance, the Millennium Academy will eventually become stronger under your leadership

Hayase Yuka (はやせユウカ) is a character that appeared in the mobile game "blue archive". In the game, she is a second-year student of Millennium College and an accountant of the Millennium College Student Union Seminar.

It is necessary to popularize science here. In the world view of the blue file, the student union is the highest authority in a region (school autonomous region), and the student union president is also the highest authority

As a student of the Millennium Institute of Science and Technology, he has shown excellent abilities in computing, and is known as the Humanoid Computer of the Millennium Institute of Science and Technology.
Therefore, it has also become the teacher's number one tool person (confirmation), helping teachers process documents and organize bills.
Because he was too confident in his own calculations, he was played around by the teacher in a poker game with the teacher
Millennium Institute of Science and Technology is a school name that appears in the mobile game "blue archive"
In the worldview of Azure Files, the school is similar to a province, which has its own autonomous region and is governed by the student union, the highest authority of the school.
Millennium Science and Technology College is a technology-based college with many clubs, and most of the students carry out activities related to research and development

There is an engineer department that studies things that either explode or have bluetooth every day, a game development department that fishes and plays games every day, and a secret service department that specializes in special tasks—the maid department and many other clubs

The seminar is its highest leadership department, with the most advanced security system in Kivatos (although it was easily breached by the Ministry of Truth, the hacker department within the millennium)
The conditions have been established. Let's define today's moment as a bond and prove it.
No, I think we need to spend more time together
On behalf of Millennium College, I hope to build a friendly relationship with Xialai
Teacher, please take care of me in the days to come.
Eh? Why is this
..., as I count, we are ready for war
It's time, let you experience the most advanced technology in the millennium (declare war)
Yes, I think this will facilitate our future cooperation.
Sorry, we've been busy at the Academy lately.
In order to facilitate future cooperation with Xia Lai, I would like to send envoys to Xia Lai.
......, I don't think we have anything to say between us
Old, teacher! What is going on with this receipt! The educator who was supposed to be a model for the students went to such a, no, dishonest shop or something...! incredible! Too bad! (condemns you)
First time meeting, I'm Hayase Yuka from Millennium Academy, I think we can sit down and talk, after all, I also have, about 1890 seconds of spare time.
Shall I show you around our school?
Well, that would be great.
In order for us to cooperate better in the future, I hope Xialai can provide more information
teacher. I will also fully support you today.
Impulsive consumption is prohibited! Consumption must be planned!
I want to form an ally with Xia Lai, I don't know what you want, sir
..., what are you trying to do with your troops deployed on the border of our school.
This time, I miscalculated...
You are so kind and sweet.
The choice is yours.
Gain +{1_num} [ICON_Science] Science from adjacent Academy areas.
Gain +{1_num} [ICON_Science] Science from the adjacent Millennium Tower area.
Millennium Tower

The center of Kivotos science and technology has the most advanced security system in the entire Kivotos, and the Millennium Supreme Authority Seminar is also located in it, but you can get +3 [ICON_Science] technology value from the adjacent academy area, or you can Provides +2 [ICON_Science] technology value to the adjacent college, only one can be built in the whole country.
Gain +{1_num} [ICON_Production] Production from the adjacent Millennium Tower area.
Engineering Department

The characteristic area of ​​the Millennium Institute of Technology, instead of the industrial area, gets +3 points of Great Engineer points instead of the usual +1, and can get +3 [ICON_Production] production from the adjacent Millennium Tower area,
Millennium Energy Core

The black technology from the Millennium Academy, unlocked together with the coal power plant, can be built in the Millennium Tower. After completion, it will provide +10 [ICON_Production] productivity and five points of clean energy for the city where it is located.
Yuka Hayase
Uncontained anger

The cost of buying cells with gold coins [ICON_Gold] -30%, and the output obtained by removing terrain is increased by 50%. All units +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking, but -3 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending

Self-propelled combat chair Thunder

The masterpiece of the Millennium Engineering Department has achieved mass production with the help of the division. It replaces modern infantry and is unlocked by "electricity" technology. It has higher mobility, combat effectiveness and lower production costs.
